snippet: “Unauthorized: The Harvey Weinstein Project,” from the director Barry Avrich, is a virtual tribute to the man who co-founded Miramax Films.
lead_paragraph: “Unauthorized: The Harvey Weinstein Project,” from the director Barry Avrich, is a virtual tribute to the man who co-founded Miramax Films.
